attributes.action: British government to condemn and not recognise The sudanese coup leader Burhan
attributes.additional_details: To support the people of Sudan democracy progress to civilian rule, which will help the African country to share the wealth in free country instead of dictatorship land as it was in Bashir era.
attributes.background: British foreign office to condemn latest coup in Sudan, where the military has dissolved civilian rule, arrested political leaders and declared a state of emergency. British parliament to ask Burhan to release hamdok and retreat back the coup

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599848
